subject: Re: Merry Christmas To All!
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
If there is any doubt that spirits are all around us, especially during 
this season... remember those who are seen many times during the next 
couple of days.  Just about everyone has seen or heard of these four... 
No Ghost Box required :-)

- Ghost of Jacob Marley
- Ghost of Christmas Past
- Ghost of Christmas Present
- Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come

Happy Holidays to All
- Mike
